thread.title: Sessions takes aim at legal marijuana as reach grows

title: Sessions takes aim at legal marijuana as reach grows
text:
Sessions takes aim at legal marijuana as reach grows Thursday, January 04, 2018 - 02:04 
The U.S. Justice Department on Thursday rescinded an Obama administration policy that had eased enforcement of federal marijuana laws in states that have legalized the drug, instead giving federal prosecutors wide latitude on pursuing criminal charges.   
The U.S. Justice Department on Thursday rescinded an Obama administration policy that had eased enforcement of federal marijuana laws in states that have legalized the drug, instead giving federal prosecutors wide latitude on pursuing criminal charges.  //reut.rs/2CH2tLZ
